ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] GU Comics - Daily OnLine Comic Strip by Woody  Hearn
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone here done much in Plane of Regrowth?  I have went twice in the last week and stayed for 12 hours once and about 8 hours another time.  Only saw two
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone here done much in Plane of Regrowth? I have went twice in the
last week and stayed for 12 hours once and about 8 hours another time. Only
saw two caster items drop (got both of them btw =P) a pair of Enchanter
gloves 5ac , 9int, 9agil, 35mana , 2vs all except magic which is 1vs and a
belt 4ac 40hps 40mana. But to spend 20 hours in a plane and only see 2
(TWO!) pieces of caster gear drop is pathetic. While I was there I saw
countless pieces of Cleric and Warrior pieces drop. Anyone else seeing this
as well? This place is really big and maybe my groups are just not pulling
the right mobs or we are not in the right area I have no idea. Just seemed
a bit strange to me.

Mu
Enchanter 54th Season
Tunare Server
-----Original Message-----
From: Melaniel [mailto:online.games@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 01, 2000 6:12 AM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] GU Comics - Daily OnLine Comic Strip by
Woody Hearn


On Tue, 31 Oct 2000 20:44:54 +0100, "(Allayana)"
<sarastro@...> wrote:

>Heya all,
>Well, me too was wondering about the lifelyness of this group! But finally
I
>got soms mail.
>
>I am also new here, so I just want to say hello too.
>
>Safe huntings,
>Allayana

Pleased to meet everyone. I think I posted once before ages ago to
this list, but otherwise I don't post much. It is a lot quieter than
the bards list I belong to, but that's the most active of them all I
think. And not just because there's a lot of complaints right now
either!

Hope to hear more from everyone!

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (48) "Flirting is a girl's best friend"
Kalara, Enchanter (37) "LOADING, PLEASE WAIT ...."
Tura, Dark Elf Necromancer (10) "Jobantik, you really smell!"
